creator: Lisitso
descriptionHtml:
Scopa is the classic Italian card game. Enjoy playing against your Android device or challenge your Facebook friends.
The game can be played at 11, 15 or 21 points, you can choose from 14 different decks of cards (Neapolitan, Piacenza, Tuscany, Piedmont, Sicilian, Bergamo, Bologna, Trentino, Trevisane, Triestine, Romagna, Sarde, Milanesi, Poker ), enable variations such as Napula, Rebello, Ace takes all (or broom aces) and Sbarazzino.
You can challenge a real player playing in multiplayer mode.. even via Bluetooth!
Discover what is your game strategy by consulting the statistics and do your best to get all the achievements.

If you like to contact me to report a bug or a new feature found in the game (such as a new deck of cards), you can write me on FACEBOOK or visit my website!

Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/LisitsoApp

Have fun with Broom by Lisitso!
descriptionShort: Download Scopa by Lisitso for Android and start playing now for free!

appDetails.developerAddress:
via del ponte di mezzo
50127 Firenze
Italy
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• We added multiplayer via Link: now you can play with a friend by sending him an invitation link via WhatsApp, FacebookMessenger etc
• New statistics! Totally renewed and with more information
• Fixed some issues and improved game performance

Need help? Contact us via the LisitsoApp Facebook page or via email. Have fun!

title: Scopa

container.value:
via del ponte di mezzo
50127 Firenze
Italy

creator: Lisitso
descriptionHtml:
Scopa is the classic Italian card game. Enjoy playing against your Android device or challenge your Facebook friends.

Main features of the app:

• Single player mode
• Multiplayer mode: via Bluetooth
• Multiplayer mode: via Facebook (invite and play with your friends)
• Multiplayer mode: via direct link (share a the game link via WhatsApp, Twitter and play)
• Multiplayer mode: with random player
Playing in multiplayer mode, data connection is required (WIFI is recommended).

• 14 different decks of cards available:
- Neapolitan
- Piacenza
- Tuscany
- Piedmont
- Sicilian
- Bergamo
- Bologna
- Trentino
- Trevisane
- Triestine
- Romagna
- Sardinian
- Milanesi
- Poker

• Play games at 11, 15 o 21 points of score
• Enable variations such as Napula, Rebello, Ace takes all (or broom aces) and Sbarazzino
• Look at the Statistics to discover your strategy
• Do your best and unlock all the Achievements

If you need support or want to make a suggestion,
follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LisitsoApp
